meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>sun</radical> is <radical>compare</radical>d to an <kanji>insect</kanji>, you’ll see that they're both shiny, but that the sun is much shinier than the insect.
readingMnemonic: While you’re holding up an <kanji>insect</kanji> to the sun for comparison, a flock of <reading>con</reading>dors (こん) flies by, blocking out the sun. There are so many condors that they manage to totally block out the sun.
